text: Hi, after running `sample` with the progress bar I can see the time it took, but is it stored anywhere? I'm trying to calculate ESS/minute

elements.text: with the progress bar I can see the time it took, but is it stored anywhere? I'm trying to calculate ESS/minute

text:
No, the progress bar you see is completely handled by ProgressLogging.jl and TerminalLoggers.jl (or IJulia/VScode if working there). Even then, you’ll have to end up rewriting a bit of boilerplate to get the time out.

Instead, consider using the `@elapsed` macro.
```tt = @elapsed(chains = sample(mod, ...))```
`tt` will be the time it took to evaluate `chains = sample(…`  in seconds. It will include any compilation time and overhead that isn’t spent generating samples, so keep that in mind.
